short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Fully interactive simulation for Transformation of Graphs.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This app helps you practising transformation of graphs for GCSE, IGCSE, GCE O Level, GCE A Level and A Level interactively.

There are three forms of transformations covered in this app:

1- Translation - both in the x-axis and y-axis
2 - Reflection - both in the x-axis and y-axis
3 - Stretching - both in the x-axis and y-axis

You can practise the transformation using the following graphs:
1 - Straight line graphs
2 - Quadratic graphs
3 - Cubic Graphs
4 - Exponential Graphs
5 - Reciprocal Graphs
6 - Trigonometric Graphs

With each transformation, the corresponding equation in the form of function notation is automatically updated so that the students can see the change.
